snippet.title: Tiny Robots: Portal Escape - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Tiny Robots: Portal Escape is an exciting 3D puzzle escape the room game set in a robot world full of curious characters, colorful levels, and exotic alternative realities. Collect items, look for hidden objects and clues, and solve tricky mechanical puzzles. Oh, and don’t forget to save your grandpa from the bad guys! 

Slip into the metal shoes of a young, smart robot named Telly. One day, as you are walking to your grandpa’s house, you witness his kidnapping. His garage is left thrashed, his inventions are broken, and all you have is a radio station connecting you to Grandpa. Who did this? What do they want? You must unveil this mystery full of brain-scratching riddles, powerful enemies, and unusual worlds.

Play mini-games
Connect to different machines and hack their mechanisms by playing classic mini-games wrapped in robot clothes. Complete hundreds of levels in our Arcade escape room and earn exciting rewards.

Epic Boss Encounters
All bad guys know that a well-placed killer mega bot here and there greatly enhances their chances of executing their plan for world domination. They don’t know that this just makes your journey more challenging and fun!

Craft Artefacts
Collect hidden fragments and combine them into artefacts on a cozy table in your very own garage. A neatly crafted artefact is a must when dealing with boss bots!

Unlock fun characters
If you must go out there and outwit your enemies, at least do it in style. Customize your robot with hundreds of different combinations! A shark head connected to a jet engine instead of legs makes your journey much more personal.

Enchanting Audio        
The immersive sound effects and music create an unforgettable atmospheric journey!

Languages
Tiny Robots: Portal Escape is available in English, French, German, Italian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Polish, Russian, Spanish, Turkish, and Chinese.
